transcript:
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Sir aap ji maine aapko bahas karne ke liye call nahi kiya tha. Main aapko kuch aur point pe puch rahi thi aap nahi us mode pe discussion leke gaye ho. Main aapko bas ye kehna chah rahi hu aap mujhe time dijiyega hafte mein ek din ka at least aur wo bhi pura ek ghanta nahi chahiye aap se.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Main aapko nahi yaar. Surya Pathak sir.
Customer: Kya bata rahe hain aap?

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan madam bolo.
Customer: Haan main ye keh rahi hu mujhe bas aapka ek din mein 10-15 minute ka hi time main aapka agar lungi to lungi ek week mein ek din ka. To us according jo mere level pe jab tak aapka jab tak aapka package chal raha hai tab tak jo leads mere end se hogi main aapko direct bhi share kar dungi aapke WhatsApp pe aur aapko uske liye guidance. Mere pass ek yahi solution hai us cheez ke liye.
Executive: Theek hai dekhte hain main kal dunga aapko time. Kal karunga call aapko.
Customer: Haan theek hai. Main aapka baki jo not satisfied wala concern hai na wo aapka close kar rahi hu kyuki uske according maine sari cheeze aapki baat karai hai to usme as such koi solution hai nahi ki hum address kar paye jo aap amount aap bol rahe ho.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Aap mujhe baki free ho kar ke na ek bar connect kar lena.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants time for discussion weekly.

- Wants leads to be shared on WhatsApp.

- Wants resolution for not satisfied concern.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to provide time for discussion.

- Executive will call the customer tomorrow.

- Executive is closing the not satisfied concern.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, whatsapp, discussion, time
